lastfmr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get the top tags chart.

Source: R/chart.R
chart_getTopTags.Rd

Get the top tags chart. Implementation of last.fm's chart.getTopTags API method (http://www.last.fm/api/show/chart.getTopTags)

chart_getTopTags(limit = NA, page = NA)

Arguments

limit

The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.
page

The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.

Value

A list of the top tags chart.

Examples

chart_getTopTags()
#>                 name                                       url  reach taggings
#> 1               rock              https://www.last.fm/tag/rock 392819  3928575
#> 2         electronic        https://www.last.fm/tag/electronic 251117  2329635
